title: 186: Bobbin for Assholes (Theo Von Drops In!)
itunes:title: Bobbin for Assholes (Theo Von Drops In!)
description:
The boys riff on athletes showing dong on live TV, eating cooter standing up, and jerkin off in hospital parking lots. Plus Theo Von drops in at the end of the episode (53:45) to riff on Monty Lopez boxing Yung Gravy, vaping on planes, and why it’s easy to wish for sex in Louisiana.
